entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
